name: Dimension Traveler
info: Learn to walk between dimensions by mastering dimensional energy and unlocking the secrets of the multiverse.
accept: I'm ready to learn dimensional travel.
decline: The dimensional barriers are too dangerous for me.

objectives.description: Learn to sense the thinning barriers between dimensions
Master the art of harnessing dimensional energy
Grow stronger in your mastery over dimensional forces
Discover the secrets of the multiverse through portals
Achieve true mastery of dimensional travel

dialogs: The barriers between dimensions grow thin, traveler.
You have the potential to walk between worlds.
But first, you must learn to harness dimensional energy.
Your mastery over dimensional forces grows stronger.
Each portal reveals new secrets of the multiverse.
You have become a true master of dimensional travel!
The infinite realms await your exploration, Dimension Traveler.
